#data preparation
```{r}

diabetes <- read_csv("/Users/laipoyu/Desktop/AU/SPRING_2024/STAT-627_4/Final/data/Dataset_of_Diabetes.csv")

diabetes$BMI_Category <- cut(diabetes$BMI,
                         breaks = c(-Inf, 18.5, 24.9, 29.9, Inf),
                         labels = c("Underweight", "Normal", "Overweight", "Obese"))

#summary of BMI
BMI_summary <- diabetes %>%
  group_by(Gender, BMI_Category) %>%
  summarise(Count = n(), .groups = 'drop')
```
